content: This user account is loaded from LDAP. If you need to change the user name and email address, or disable a user, refer to the LDAP directory.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a tooltip explaining that a user's account is loaded from LDAP, providing guidance on how to manage their account details. It appears in UI elements related to user accounts and profiles. Translators should provide an explanation of what it means for a user's account to be "loaded from LDAP".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "تعطيل حساب مستخدم" is technically correct, but a more natural and common phrasing for disabling a user account in Arabic would be "تعطيل مستخدم".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يتم تحميل حساب المستخدم من LDAP. إذا كنت بحاجة إلى تغيير اسم المستخدم والبريد الالكتروني، أو تعطيل مستخدم، راجع دليل LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "Jos haluat vaihtaa käyttäjänimeä tai sähköpostiosoitetta, tai poistaa käyttäjä käytöstä" is grammatically awkward. The phrase 'käyttäjä käytöstä' should be 'käyttäjä pois käytöstä' or 'käyttäjä poistosta'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jos haluat vaihtaa käyttäjänimeä tai sähköpostiosoitetta, tai poistaa käyttäjä pois käytöstä.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence is long and could be split for better readability. While not strictly incorrect, it's less fluent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tämä käyttäjätili on ladattu LDAP:lta. Jos haluat vaihtaa käyttäjänimeä tai sähköpostiosoitetta, tee se LDAP-hakemistossa. Jos haluat poistaa käyttäjän käytöstä, tee se myös LDAP-hakemistossa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'էլ․փոստի' is an abbreviation and might be unclear to some users. While technically correct, a full spelling would be more accessible.
The use of a space before the colon after 'էլ․փոստի' (or suggested replacement) is inconsistent with standard Armenian punctuation. Consider removing the space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the space before the colon: 'էլ․փոստի:' or 'էլեկտրոնային փոստի:'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'indirizzo' is missing an accent. It should be 'indirizzo'.
The phrase "ກວດເບິ່ງບຸ໋ກ LDAP" (check LDAP book) is an awkward and inaccurate translation of "refer to the LDAP directory." "ບຸ໋ກ" means 'book'. It doesn't convey the meaning of a directory.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປຶ້ມບັນຊີລາຍຊື່ຜູ້ໃຊ້ LDAP (pʉ̂ʉm banchii laai sʉ̃ʉ phʉ̃ʉ chai LDAP) - 'LDAP user list book' - is better, but still not ideal. A more accurate translation would be: ອ້າງອີງເຖິງບຸ໋ກບັນຊີລາຍຊື່ຜູ້ໃຊ້ LDAP (aang iing thʉ̌ng bʉ̂ʉm banchii laai sʉ̃ʉ phʉ̃ʉ chai LDAP) - 'Refer to the LDAP user list book' or just ປຶ້ມບັນຊີລາຍຊື່ຜູ້ໃຊ້ LDAP (pʉ̂ʉm banchii laai sʉ̃ʉ phʉ̃ʉ chai LDAP).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Dane konto użytkownika' is grammatically incorrect. 'Dane' (data) is unnecessary and awkward. It should be 'Konto użytkownika'.
The phrase 'odwołać się do katalogu LDAP' is a bit formal and could be improved.  A more natural phrasing might be 'sprawdzić katalog LDAP' or 'zreferować do katalogu LDAP'.
The Romanian translation uses a semicolon (;) after 'adresa de e-mail' instead of a comma (,) which is more common and grammatically correct in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Contul acestui utilizator este încărcat din LDAP. Dacă doriți să schimbați nume de utilizator și adresa de e-mail, sau să dezactivați utilizatorul, accesați repertoarul LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පරිශීලක' (parishiilaka) is used repeatedly and might be better represented as 'පරිශ්‍රමික' (parashramika) which directly translates to 'user' or 'worker' and is more commonly used in this context.
The phrase 'LDAP වෙතින් පැටවිනි' (LDAP venin patawini) sounds slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing could be 'LDAP වෙතින් බද්ධ කර ඇත' (LDAP vatin badha kara ath).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'LDAP වෙතින් පැටවිනි' with 'LDAP වෙතින් බද්ධ කර ඇත'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'නාමාවලිය වෙත යොමු වන්න' (naamawaliye vetha yomu vanna) translates to 'refer to the directory', but it's a very formal way of saying it. A more user-friendly translation would be 'LDAP සේවාව බලන්න' (LDAP sevavaa balanna) or 'LDAP පරිශීලක ලේඛනය බලන්න' (LDAP parishiilaka lekhanaa balanna).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'නාමාවලිය වෙත යොමු වන්න' with 'LDAP සේවාව බලන්න' or 'LDAP පරිශීලක ලේඛනය බලන්න'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'user account' is translated as 'používateľské konto'. While understandable, 'používateľský účet' would be a more common and natural translation in Slovak.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Toto používateľský účet je nahrané z LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "odpri imenik LDAP" (open LDAP directory) implies an action of opening a directory as a document, rather than referring the user to manage the LDAP directory itself. A better translation would specify where the changes should be made.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Za spremembo uporabniškega imena in e-poštnega naslova ali onemogočitev uporabnika, upravljajte imenik LDAP.
